metadata.title: CVE-2023-52583 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS (noble) - negligible
metadata.description: In the Linux kernel, the following vulnerability has been resolved: ceph:fix deadlock or deadcode of misusing dget() The lock order is incorrectbetween denty and its parent, we should always make sure that the parentget the lock first. But since this deadcode is never used and the parentdir will always be set from the callers, let's just remove it.

criterions.comment: linux package in noble is affected. An update containing the fix has been completed and is pending publication (note: '6.8.0-7.7').
